words.source: H7200 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of רָאָה 'to see'; KJV 'and when … saw', ESV 'but when … saw', NASB 'but when … saw'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H3588 conj. ki 'that, for'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H2308 Qal perf. 3ms of חָדַל 'to cease, stop'; KJV 'ceased', ESV 'had ceased', NASB 'had ceased'
H4306 art. + n.ms matar 'rain'; KJV 'the rain', ESV 'the rain', NASB 'the rain'
H1259 waw + art. + n.ms barad 'hail'; KJV 'and the hail', ESV 'and the hail', NASB 'and the hail'
H6963 waw + art. + n.mp qolot 'voices, thunders'; KJV 'and the thunders', ESV 'and the thunder', NASB 'and the thunder'
H3254 wayyiqtol 3ms Hiphil of יָסַף 'to add, continue'; KJV 'sinned yet more', ESV 'sinned yet again', NASB 'continued to sin'
H2398 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of חָטָא 'to sin'; KJV 'to sin', ESV 'to sin', NASB 'to sin'
H3513 wayyiqtol 3ms Hiphil of כָּבַד 'to be heavy'; KJV 'and hardened', ESV 'and hardened', NASB 'and he made heavy'
H3820 n.ms constr. lev 'heart' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his heart', ESV 'his heart', NASB 'his heart'
H1931 indep. pron. 3ms huʾ 'he'; KJV 'he', ESV 'he', NASB 'he'
H5650 waw + n.mp constr. ʿeved 'servant' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'and his servants', ESV 'and his servants', NASB 'and his servants'
